voteserver

Class VoteServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • voteserver.VoteServer

  • public class VoteServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Server for vote-counting application. VoteServer is a forking server which can handle multiple clients and record all votes in a thread-safe manner. The actual data (some of which is passed to the client) is read and parsed from an input XML file by InputParser.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main executing method. Check arguments and print appropriate usage message. Then, if arguments are all right, try to establish connection and send data. Lastly, go into a never-ending loop to listen for and accept client connections and spawn threads to handle them.
        Parameters:
        args - the command-line arguments: and
